channel.title: Ggplot2 on true positives

item.title: Second axis in R with ggplot2
item.author: fede.garza.ramirez@gmail.com (Federico Garza)
item.description: purrr::map(c("AER", "dplyr", "ggplot2"), library, character.only = T) ## Loading required package: car ## Loading required package: lmtest ## Loading required package: zoo ## ## Attaching package: 'zoo' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## as.Date, as.Date.numeric ## Loading required package: sandwich ## Loading required package: survival ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following object is masked from 'package:car': ## ## recode ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
